name: Wally Hardmaker's Funland - Home Trials
description:
A 3rd person fighting and shooter game included with QTE mechanics... In the 1800's London.

Fight foes with Wally Hardmaker in the deepest depths of the underground builds, adventuring through the worlds where you either kill or get killed. With so many people you can encounter, you see through their view of the world and how their personalities are. But of course, there will be many foes getting in your way that you must fight off. With an english cast of characters, you can interact, do tasks given to you, and spend free time howewer you would like in the places you go!

Home Trials offers you multiple uniqe ways of handling combat mechanics with extra controls you have to focus on which makes the fights more challenging. The game includes switching from fights in 3rd person fighter/ shooter to Quick Time Events in certain parts of the fight. You may also interact with objects or overall anything on the place you're fighting with your enemy, from breaking pipes and using them as weapons to throwing wardrobes on your enemies! With the uniqe mechanic 'Inner voice' you gain, you can make quick and savage moves with the power you have gained in this funky styled theme!

Not to forget about puzzles and tasks you encounter during your road to getting to the bottom of this mess, you will be given tasks and obstacles through your path to the next chapter!
